mapper.sql: left join transaction_attribute ta_s_from on ta_s_from.domain_id = d.id and ta_s_from.entity_attribute_id = 6 and ta_s_from.status = 1 left join transaction_attribute ta_s_to on ta_s_to.domain_id = d.id and ta_s_to.entity_attribute_id = 7 and ta_s_to.status = 1

(select concat(wa_id.text, ln_v.text, fn_v.text, mn_v.text) w_name from transaction_attribute ta
left join `transaction` t on ta.domain_id = t.id
left join worker w on w.object_id = ta.number and w.status = 1
left join worker_attribute wa_id on wa_id.domain_id = w.id and wa_id.entity_attribute_id = 1 and wa_id.status = 1
left join worker_attribute wa_fn on wa_fn.domain_id = w.id and wa_fn.entity_attribute_id = 2 and wa_fn.status = 1 left join first_name fn_a on fn.object_id = wa_fn.number and fn.status = 1 left join first_name_attribute fn_a on fn_a.domain_id = fn.id and fn_a.status = 1 left join first_name_value fn_v on fn_a.id = fn_v.attribute_id
left join worker_attribute wa_mn on wa_mn.domain_id = w.id and wa_mn.entity_attribute_id = 3 and wa_mn.status = 1 left join middle_name mn on mn.object_id = wa_mn.number and mn.status = 1 left join middle_name_attribute mn_a on mn_a.domain_id = mn.id and mn_a.status = 1 left join middle_name_value mn_v on mn_a.id = mn_v.attribute_id
left join worker_attribute wa_ln on wa_ln.domain_id = w.id and wa_ln.entity_attribute_id = 4 and wa_ln.status = 1 left join last_name ln on ln.object_id = wa_ln.number and ln.status = 1 left join last_name_attribute ln_a on ln_a.domain_id = ln.id and ln_a.status = 1 left join last_name_value ln_v on ln_a.id = ln_v.attribute_id
where t.object_id = d.object_id and ta.entity_attribute_id = 8 and ta.status = 1 )

(select concat(ln_v.text, fn_v.text, mn_v.text) c_name from `transaction` t
left join transaction_attribute ta_fn on ta_fn.domain_id = t.id and ta_fn.entity_attribute_id = 9 and ta_fn.status = 1 left join first_name fn on fn.object_id = ta_fn.number and fn.status = 1 left join first_name_attribute fn_a on fn_a.domain_id = fn.id and fn_a.status = 1 left join first_name_value fn_v on fn_a.id = fn_v.attribute_id
left join transaction_attribute ta_mn on ta_mn.domain_id = t.id and ta_mn.entity_attribute_id = 10 and ta_mn.status = 1 left join middle_name mn on mn.object_id = ta_mn.number and mn.status = 1 left join middle_name_attribute mn_a on mn_a.domain_id = mn.id and mn_a.status = 1 left join middle_name_value mn_v on mn_a.id = mn_v.attribute_id
left join transaction_attribute ta_ln on ta_ln.domain_id = t.id and ta_ln.entity_attribute_id = 11 and ta_ln.status = 1 left join last_name ln on ln.object_id = ta_ln.number and ln.status = 1 left join last_name_attribute ln_a on ln_a.domain_id = ln.id and ln_a.status = 1 left join last_name_value ln_v on ln_a.id = ln_v.attribute_id
where t.object_id = d.object_id )

sql.if: and (exists(select ta.id from transaction_attribute ta left join transaction_attribute ta_tt on ta.domain_id = ta_tt.domain_id and ta_tt.status = 1 and ta_tt.entity_attribute_id = 4 where ta.domain_id = d.id and ta.status = 1 and ta.entity_attribute_id = 3 and ta.number = 3 and ta_tt.number = 1 and d.end_date is null))
